entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
